input.content:
You are an expert SQL developer. Write syntactically correct SQLite queries to answer the following questions.

Schema:
Table: employees (id, name, department, salary, hire_date)
Table: departments (id, name, manager_id)
Get all employees from the 'Engineering' department.

You are an expert SQL developer. Write syntactically correct SQLite queries to answer the following questions.

Schema:
Table: employees (id, name, department, salary, hire_date)
Table: departments (id, name, manager_id)
Count the total number of employees.

You are an expert SQL developer. Write syntactically correct SQLite queries to answer the following questions.

Schema:
Table: employees (id, name, department, salary, hire_date)
Table: departments (id, name, manager_id)
Find the highest salary in the company.

You are an expert SQL developer. Write syntactically correct SQLite queries to answer the following questions.

Schema:
Table: employees (id, name, department, salary, hire_date)
Table: departments (id, name, manager_id)
Get the names of all departments.

You are an expert SQL developer. Write syntactically correct SQLite queries to answer the following questions.

Schema:
Table: employees (id, name, department, salary, hire_date)
Table: departments (id, name, manager_id)
Find employees with salary greater than 50000.

You are an expert SQL developer. Write syntactically correct SQLite queries to answer the following questions.

Schema:
Table: employees (id, name, department, salary, hire_date)
Table: departments (id, name, manager_id)
Get the average salary by department.

ideal: SELECT department, AVG(salary) FROM employees GROUP BY department;

input.content:
You are an expert SQL developer. Write syntactically correct SQLite queries to answer the following questions.

Schema:
Table: employees (id, name, department, salary, hire_date)
Table: departments (id, name, manager_id)
Sort employees by salary in descending order.

ideal: SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY salary DESC;

input.content:
You are an expert SQL developer. Write syntactically correct SQLite queries to answer the following questions.

Schema:
Table: employees (id, name, department, salary, hire_date)
Table: departments (id, name, manager_id)
Find employees hired after 2020-01-01.

You are an expert SQL developer. Write syntactically correct SQLite queries to answer the following questions.

Schema:
Table: employees (id, name, department, salary, hire_date)
Table: departments (id, name, manager_id)
Count employees in each department.

ideal: SELECT department, COUNT(*) FROM employees GROUP BY department;

input.content:
You are an expert SQL developer. Write syntactically correct SQLite queries to answer the following questions.

Schema:
Table: employees (id, name, department, salary, hire_date)
Table: departments (id, name, manager_id)
Get the top 3 highest paid employees.

ideal: SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY salary DESC LIMIT 3;
